q1: Just how good are Germany as a football team?
a1: Not as good as they used to be.
q2: Why did Germany used to be better?
a2: Some of their best players are just aging and not as sharp as they used to be.
q3: Do you think that the new players coming in could get back to the heights that the old players got to?
a3: I think they can given time and experience.
q4: Yes, it's time to let go of the past and hope for the best of them
a4: Yeah, they need to overhaul the team
q5: Where do you think Germany should start the overhaul?
a5: Get rid of the older players
